description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows standards-based storage management service denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-30083):

1. Apply the KB-5039330 update released on June 11, 2024. 
2. Ensure your environment meets the prerequisites for this update.
3. Restart your system to activate the changes.

**Details**:
This update addresses a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability, allowing unauthorized attackers to exploit the service remotely and deny access to storage resources. The CVSS base score is 7.5, denoting a significant impact on availability. It is crucial to maintain updated systems to prevent potential exploitation. Further documentation can be referenced at [Microsoft Update Guide](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-30083).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system runs on supported platforms.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of the update.
